Uses of Class
io.atomix.copycat.Resource

  • Packages that use Resource 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.copycat
    Core Copycat APIs, including CopycatClient and CopycatReplica.
    io.atomix.copycat.atomic
    Provides distributed atomic variables such as DistributedAtomicValue.
    io.atomix.copycat.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap and DistributedSet.
    io.atomix.copycat.coordination
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedLeaderElection and DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.

    • Uses of Resource in io.atomix.copycat

      Methods in io.atomix.copycat with type parameters of type Resource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Resource>
      CompletableFuture<T>      		 Copycat.create(String path, Class<? super T> type)
      Creates a resource at the given path.
      <T extends Resource>
      CompletableFuture<T>      		 Copycat.get(String path, Class<? super T> type)
      Gets the resource at the given path.

      class  DistributedAtomicValue<T>
      Distributed atomic value.
